front.title: SNMP Protocol Operations for Invoking Operations

abstract.t: This document defines additional protocol operations for the SimpleNetwork Management Protocol (SNMP) that support more efficientconfiguration management via SNMP. The CallRequest and CallResponsePDUs add an RPC style operation invocation mechanism to SNMP. TheCompoundRequest and CompoundResponse PDUs add a mechanism to sendmultiple SNMP operations in a single SNMP message.
